name: Cycling
description: Either outdoor cycling or stationary cycling can help lower LDL cholesterol and improve overall cardiovascular health.
benefits: Boosts cardiovascular fitness, Aids in weight loss, Lowers body fat levels

name: Weight Training
description: Strengthens muscles and bones, improves metabolic rate, and can help in maintaining a healthy weight.
benefits: Increases muscle mass, Boosts metabolism, Aids in body composition management
